page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: Clubs The village halls at Nawton and Wombleton are run by committees which organise regular events like domino and whist drives and coffee mornings which are well supported. A pre-school playgroup and an over sixties club meet regularly at Nawton. Wombleton also has an over sixties club. There is an Adult Education Centre based at the local comprehensive school at Nawton, providing afternoon and evening courses in arts and crafts, keep fit, yoga, sports, liesure and academic pursuits.Bee keeping,natural history and Wombleton badminton club also use the centre as a base.
